attributes.action: put a stop to unsolicited nuisance phone calls
attributes.background: I get at least 2 phone calls a day [more some days].they ring at all times of the day.sometimes there is no one there.you cannot ignore them incase its a genuine call.the whole country suffers with this.there must be a way of stopping it. it's harassment .

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105999

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
